sentences.sContent: The policemen bore up to  their duty in the face of the terrorists.
sentences.sCn: 面对恐怖分子，警察始终忠于职守。

sentences.sContent: Perhaps you have great intentions, but they crumble in the face of reality.
sentences.sCn: 你也许有长远的打算，但是当你面对现实时，它们破灭了。

sentences.sContent: What to do in the face of terrorism?
sentences.sCn: 那么面对恐怖主义，该怎么办呢？
